description: Comprehensive concept analysis using multiple philosophical lenses - centrality mapping, evolution tracking, affordance analysis, and demarcation
base_description: Comprehensive concept analysis using multiple philosophical lenses - centrality mapping, evolution tracking, affordance analysis, and demarcation
selection_criteria: Select 2-3 engines most relevant to the concepts discussed in the document. Prefer centrality_mapper for structural understanding, evolution for temporal aspects, affordance for practical implications, demarcation for boundary questions, and presuppositional for hidden assumptions.
